group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much for your patronage!
Let's see...if I press this...
Huh?@That opened the register...
So maybe I should press this one...
[chara:102501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!@Some paper's shooting out!
Oh no, it won't stop at all!!

group_1.textRight: Chiharu?
Please restock the shelves in the back with more@daidaikko.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes!

group_1.textCenter: Alright, gotta restock the back shelves...

group_1.textRight: Chiharu!!
...and so my grandson came here to visit me!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure he must be happy to see you.
(At first I was teaching her about the daidaikko,)
(but then we got sidetracked, and before I knew it,@we've been talking about her grandchildren all this@time...)
(But...she looks so delighted that I can't bring myself@to interrupt her...)

group_1.textRight: Erm, are you listening?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I am!
(I wonder how Shizuka and Charu are doing?)
(I can't be of any help like this.)
(If things continue to be this way, then tomorrow,@we'll surely be...)
...It looks like things didn't go right for either of us.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, what a mess...
I couldn't focus on my job since I kept smelling@someone's malice.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Where's Sunao?
Sunao!

group_1.textRight: Y-yes!

group_1.textLeft: You were zoning out again...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...
At this rate, I'm certain I'll fail again tomorrow.
And that would make my parents worried again...

group_1.textLeft: They were really worried about you yesterday.

group_1.textRight: My parents worry about everything I do.

group_1.textLeft: If you can muster up the courage, why not just@tell them...
...you'll be fine, and there's no need for them to@come tomorrow?

group_1.textRight: I...mustn't do that.
If I said that, they would only worry even more.

group_1.textLeft: While it's natural for a mother to worry about@her child,
your mother honestly seemed to be worrying@TOO much.

group_1.textRight: I think...that's probably my fault.

group_1.textLeft: Your fault?

group_1.textRight: It's because of my wish, to be precise.
I haven't told either of you what it was, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Can you?

group_1.textRight: ...Very well.
I'll tell you.
I'll tell you about my wish, and what happened with@me and my parents.

group_1.narration: It all happened about one year ago...
